name: Affinis Technosoft
overview:
Established in the year 2003, at Jalandhar (Punjab, India), we, “Affinis Technosoft,” are a leading name, which has expertise in rendering technologically advanced Software Development Solutions. We provide innovative software solutions for different industrial sectors like Banking & Financial, Insurance, Life Sciences & Healthcare, Telecom, Media & Entertainment, Educational, Energy & Petrochemicals, Manufacturing, Automotive, SAP, CRM & ERP Services, and many more. Leveraging on our in-depth domain expertise, we ensure to deliver innovative solutions.

Our Team: Software developers Quality controllers R&D experts Procuring agents Skilled workers Marketing & sales executives

Our Quality Assurance: Quality is the foremost objective of our organization, so we follow strict quality rules defined in the company regulations. Our team of quality experts ensures that each business process is followed as per the set industry standards.

Client Satisfaction: As one of the trustworthy enterprise in the concerned domain, we provide maximum level of satisfaction by delivering clients the finest quality products. Our company believes in ethical business practices and makes sure transparent dealings with our honored clients.

Why Us?: Prompt and quick services Talented workforce Timely completion of undertaken projects Deliver only quality assured security systems Complete customer satisfaction Ethical business policies Transparent dealings
